item.title: How do i change Max Stat Lvl + Combat lvl? please help fast as possible
item.dc:creator: @sasquiotch sasquiotch
item.description:
@sasquiotch wrote:

go to client.java and look up yor max stat Ex.99 then youll see like [code]}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 99;
}[/code] change the 99's or whatever your skill would be to what max skill you want.. compile then run
